Nan Copeland is a front-end designer at Industry Dive, a media startup in Washington, D.C., where she spends a lot of time creating mocks in Sketch and bringing them to life with Sass. When not working, she can often be found at The Wonderland Ballroom or Compass Coffee. Contact her at nmcopeland1@gmail.com.
